title: Cache Component
description: Component to store and retrieve value from key:value storage

StoreKeyValue.title: Upsert Key:Value pair
StoreKeyValue.description: Insert new or update existing Key:Value pair

StoreKeyValueBatch.title: Upsert Key:Value pair Batch
StoreKeyValueBatch.description: Insert new or replace existing Key:Value pair from Batch

RetrieveKeyValue.title: Lookup Key:Value pair
RetrieveKeyValue.description: Retrieve existing Key:Value pair by Key

default.label: Default value if key was not found

RetrieveKeyValueBatch.title: Lookup Key:Value pair Batch
RetrieveKeyValueBatch.description: Retrieve existing Key:Value pair by Key Batch

default.label: Default value if key was not found

RemoveKeyValue.title: Delete Key:Value pair
RemoveKeyValue.description: Remove existing Key:Value pair by Key

allValues.label: Delete all values for this key
